title: In Blue (film)
content:
In Blue is a 2017 Dutch drama film directed by Jaap van Heusden.[2][3] It was shortlisted by the EYE Film Institute Netherlands as one of the eight films to be selected as the potential Dutch submission for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film at the 90th Academy Awards.[4] However, it was not selected, with Layla M. being chosen as the Dutch entry.[5]

This article related to a Dutch film of the 2010s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
